description: Liverpool: Slot - 'Everybody wants Salah, including us'
title: 'Everybody wants Salah, including us'
title_page: Liverpool: Slot - 'Everybody wants Salah, including us' - BBC Sport
maintext:
Liverpool boss Arne Slot was asked what advice he would give to Mo Salah after Saudi Arabia's sports minister said "they would love to have him" in their league.
"Everybody wants him, including us. We want him to extend of course as well - that is clear," Slot said.
